text: Kaiparapelta askewi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pseudococculinidae. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean from South Carolina, USA to Madeira == Description == The maximum recorded shell length is 2.7 mm.Welch J. J. (2010). "The "Island Rule" and Deep-Sea Gastropods: Re-Examining the Evidence". PLOS One 5(1): e8776. . == Habitat == Minimum recorded depth is 194 m. Maximum recorded depth is 194 m. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Pseudococculinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1995
title: Kaiparapelta askewi
